70b5('dul ba): dka chos gos rnams gyon te zan bza' bar mi nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis rdul zan 'jam po dang / zan bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// 
70b6('dul ba): nga gzhan dgacig gis ma nus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gyis bag 'gum pa/ de dag kyis phyogs dben pa'i babya ba bya ste/ 'di la bgyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
70b7('dul ba): nyan yod na rgyal ba rgyal byed kyi tshel mgon med pas sbyin gyi kun dka' rab na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams su bo dregs ldan la gcer bur khrus byed pa bram ze dang khyim bdagi rnams
70b8('dul ba): kyis mdzan sa rjes pa/ shes ldan dag gi ci thag byed ba di dag can gzha dgas pa/ don /  thabar na//  na 'og
71a1('dul ba): pa dang ldan pa de lta bul du tsha shes pa dang bral yod pa dang bral ba 'di sa bu dag ga la yod ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / 
71a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis sgren mor khrus mi bya'o// byed na
71a3('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang khrus ras bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus ras bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams nyis slar 'chang nas/ 
71a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshig rkyang bcang bar bya ste gang lnga nyis sbyar yod pa des ni chu brtags la bkru bar bya'o// chos gos gsum pa rnams mi rung ngo snyam nas mi 'chas
71a5('dul ba): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnamasna mis kyang byin gyis brlabs te bcang byar bya'o// gzhan dag cig gis khrus ras mya rnyed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 
71a6('dul ba): bum pa/ gang dag gis khrus ras ma rnyed pas lo ma dag gis mdun dang rgyab nas g.yogs te/ phyogs dben pa gang na gzhan dag gis thong nal ma dad par mi 'gyur bar khrus bya'o// 
71a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams khrus rus bcus te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras tshig rta sa ni bron chag dag med mod kyi 'on kyang ras bshal nas bcu
71a8('dul ba): ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sdom ni/ mon sran gre'u dang mi rung ba'i// sa dang bsgrags shing za ba dang // bdams shing zas ni za ba dang // 'gyod dang khar ba'i lhung bzed do// sangs
71b1('dul ba): kyi kud da 'ang ba na bdu cha dang ldan pa nam gru gang cwa la yang khu phrag zabacig pas
71b2('dul ba): theg can rnam gru lu thAg can nas bya bar chags so// de dus gzhan zhig na chab khungs dazhugs pa dang / des den mon sran gre'u mazhal la zhig mthong nas de yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtag pa sdu
71b3('dul ba): pa bdag gis sa bon gyi chos ma rung bar byas so snyam mo// rkye nam dus gzhan zhig na dge 'dun la mon sran pa 'i bza' bdag cig grub dom za bar lhung bya byed bkab ste 'dug pa dang / stan/ 
71b4('dul ba): cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po dge 'dun la mon sran gre'u'i bza' ba dag byung ba ci'i slad du mi gsol/ des smras pa mu dag kho bos sa bon gyi chos ma rung
71b5('dul ba): b+has s+ho// de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan pa ji lta bu zhig bgyis/ des ji ltar zla rab bskrad pa dang / de dag gis kyang mi pa 'ab rtsams so// de dag la 'grogs pa shes rnams kyis
71b6('dul ba): ci'i phyir myin/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de 'khor mang po can zhig pas de la brten nas dge 'dun thams cad kyis ma zos so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan/ 
71b7('dul ba): 'das la ga sol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgas bon ci'i ga sa ches dka' bzhes bya ba yod de/ de yang dngas bzung na chos sa zhes byas nas bza' bur ste/ 
71b8('dul ba): 'di la 'gyod par ma bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor hUM/ 
72a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma nus pa/ btsun mo rung ba sa nas shing ma sa rung ba'i stsa 'bras bu sngags mangs spyod par bcoM 'gro/ radz+dza/ 
72a2('dul ba): su longs spyad par mi bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor yongs su longs spyad par mi bya'o// btsun pa re shig mi rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la mi rung ba'i
72a3('dul ba): par 'bras bu dag lcags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi 'am/ yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor langs su longs spyad par mi bya'o// btsun pa re shig rung ba'is nas
72a4('dul ba): shing 'khrungs la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi 'am/ yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor gal te zhag tu ma lon na yongs su longs/ 
72a5('dul ba): par bya'o// btsun pa re shig rung ba'i sanas shing 'khrungs la rung ba'i ser 'bras bu dag lpags na yongs su longs spyad padra bak+ta 'am/ yongs su longs spyad pa ma bgyi/ 12
72a6('dul ba): 'khor ljongs su longs spyad bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgron medo zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yodan
72a7('dul ba): bram ze zhig gnas pa des slongs mo btab pas glang zhig rnyed do// de'i bag tu ba'ig rnyed do// de'i 'og tu yang glang zhig rnyed do// de'i 'og tu yang bzhig rnyed de ring ba lang khyu longs par gyur
72a8('dul ba): // bram ze des thog mar rnyed pa'i glang la bkra shis kyi klu byung nas/ glang de yan du btang ngo // dus gzhan zheg na de rgas 'phags nyam chung bar gyur te/ de mu 'dod nas chu bo drags
72b1('dul ba): na kyi 'gras du song ba las 'ang mdu song ngo //  rdzun pa shA ri bu lang la mdor song ba sas/ des mthong nas bsams pa/ ya rmi ma ga 'i rgya brgya rdung nad ma rnam pa dang // yang/ 
72b2('dul ba): par mthong ngo // stsal rag las snyam pa dang / 'dun dzin la ste/ des 'dam nas phyung nas la gapas phyis so// de nas bzhin 'byangs 'di lta ra bye tha da na mi rtag pa'o// chos thams ca
72b3('dul ba): bdag med pa'o// mya ngan lngas 'das pa ni ni ba'o zhes tshig gsum bshad de ngal dang bar yang gyis shig dang / de lta na byol song gi skye gnas las 'dod chags dang rngam pang 'gyur ro zhes sbas
72b4('dul ba): nas song ngo // de yang tha dag gis zos pa dang / de wa dag gis za ba'i tshe bsams pa/ gal te 'phags pa de 'dir ma byin na bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de tshe dang
72b5('dul ba): napa shA ri'i bu la sems mngon par dad par byas nas dus las 'das te mnyan yod na bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i rigs shig tu skyes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus klang de'i yan smra / 
72b6('dul ba): bruzhig yin bsams pa dang / ngi tsam ni dus las 'das par mthong ngo // yang gar skyes pas mas pa dang / mnyan yod nyid du tham ra las drug la brtson pa'i rigs su skyes par mthong na
72b7('dul ba): kyi mad yang dang yang du song zhing des bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te skabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa rireg ni dag la bkod do// de dus gzhan zhig ni rtsa bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul med par song
72b8('dul ba): dang / bram ze des sbas pa/ 'phags pa ci phye bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul mi mnga' 'am/ des smras pa bzhin bzangs ci kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul dag rtsaka sha las bzung ba
73a1('dul ba): 'am/ rtsa ku sha la bzung bas 'byung ngam/ khyod lta bu las rnyed pa gang yin pa kho bar phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul du 'gyur med/ 'phags pa bdag gi mchis dra
73a2('dul ba): 'di la sems can zhugs te gral te khye'ur bcas na de khyod kyi phye bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul bgyi'o// bzhin bzangs nad med cig blangs so zhes smras nas song ngo // de zla ba brgyad
73a3('dul ba): dam dgu 'das nas bla ba lang gi sha tshugs lta bu zhig btsas pa dang / de'i nye du rnams lhags te 'dus nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas
73a4('dul ba): nas meng dogs par byed de/ khye'u'i ming cir gdags/ nye du rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi phyir khye'u 'di sha chugs ba lang dang 'dra ba'i de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ba lang bdag tu gdags so
73a5('dul ba): sa ming bya lang bdag ces bya bar btags so// de bskyed bsrangs nas chen por gyur pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te/ 
73a6('dul ba): mnyan yod du 'asod snyoms kyi bye thugs so// mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgya ban des bral zede'i khyi mdu byin pad / brum zedes byor ba legs so nas bya ba'i sla ba kun du spyad nas
73a7('dul ba): rkang pal phyag byas so// chung mas kyang de la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang shing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo// khye'u tshe na
73a8('dul ba): byas pa dang / des khye'u de la smras pa/ bu kyod ngas ma bcas pa nus 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i phye bzhin 'brang ba dge tshul du yul kyis 'phags pa dang lhan cig so shig/ sems can de'i
73b1('dul ba): pa tha ma pa zhig sa/ de'i bya brgan sang ba dang / dang da bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ gdams dag byin no// des 'bad brtsal bskyams pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang / man
73b2('dul ba): cha lnga pa 'di nyid rtags nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams sa nyid kyis 'jig pa srung ba/ 'gyes pa/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can du bsgoms te nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas pang
73b3('dul ba): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sems gser dang bor bar mtshungs pa/ tsan dan dang ste'ur 'dra ba/ nam mkha' dang lag mthal du mnyam pa/ 
73b4('dul ba): rig pa'i sgonga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang
73b5('dul ba): dang nye dbang du bcus pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / gus par smra bar bya ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to// de la las las skyes pa'i meng pa gnyis yod de/ gcig nas ni spyugs pa
73b6('dul ba): /  gos nas kyid so// ma ldan dus kyis kyi yin pa'i sa kyi bzlab pam bcas pan ni zugs shi srid do// gang gi cha bcas pa na pam+b+ha/ yi/ 
73b7('dul ba): 'do bas de lus te/ nyam chung / sheg shig po// rod nyams par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
73b8('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo ba lang bdag ci'i phyir lus te/ nyam mung / shig shig po// dod nyams pas gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
74a1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang la phas kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i med pa gnyis grub pa des bsgrags pa lan gnyis sam/ gsum bor te kha bkrus nas lhag ma
74a2('dul ba): med par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams zas zos nas bsgrags te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gzhan zhig
74a3('dul ba): zan zos te blugs na des kha bkru bAr bya ste/ 'dil 'gyod par mi bya'o// gang gi tshe che dang ldan pa ba lang bdag rab tu byung ba de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya smod/ kha zer zhing
74a4('dul ba): shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ da ni ba lang bdag la sogs pa 'jigs 'jigs lnga rnams kyang rab tu 'byin to zhes pa
74a5('dul ba): bas de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos chen por rab dang 'dra ba la skye bo'i tshogs phal po che ma dang par
74a6('dul ba): dkyis/ de lta bas na ba lang bdag yul dbus su gnas su mi gzhug go snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag la bka' stsal pa/ ba lang bdag khyod deng phyin chad yul da
74a7('dul ba): nam gnas par mtha' 'khob kyi gnas mal dag sten cig/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas mnyan yod nas mi sna
74a8('dul ba): babar gyur te/ shing shing sha ka'i gzhal med stong par 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong bas mchi'i
74b1('dul ba): gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dag spang lung bdag 'di yin no// dge slong rnams
74b2('dul ba): bgus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis lngas ci zhig brtses na las de'i rnam par smin pas sha tshugs pa long lta bur gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ 
74b3('dul ba): dge slong dag pa lang bdag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bstar ba/ mu bo bzhin nye bar gnas pa nges par myong bar 'gyur ba yin te/ b.lang
74b4('dul ba): bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i las rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sna'i khams la sman par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la
74b5('dul ba): ma yin/ ming khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang pas dag pa dang / mi dgeb pas shing bsags pa rnams ni zan pa'i phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dag kho nas
74b6('dul ba): rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang // las rnams chung ba 'i 'gyur te// tshegs shing dus la 'ab pan// lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ dge slong dag snga
74b7('dul ba): nga ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dbu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung shes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bang gshegs pa/ 'jig
74b8('dul ba): na mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul yi lo lo sgyur pa blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
75a1('dul ba): dge slong gang gis rab byung ba danas 'phags nyam chung bzhag ste/ des de'i ltung bzed 'khrub na dge slong gzhan/ ga dang lhan cig khwa ten zer ba las rang zhig tus
75a2('dul ba): nas de'i mkhan po des 'ang dgar can thos pa dang / de kha ton lnga chags pas mkhan po las 'phyas so// ji tsam dus gzhan nigan zan ces nas bdag nyid kyi lhung bzed bkrus te mkhan
75a3('dul ba): po'i drung du song ba dang / da dung zan za ba mthong na de kun nas dkris pas smras pa/ mkhan po tsa khyod glang rgan bzhin du ldad ning bzhugs sam/ des bsams pa/ 'di kun nas dkris pas
75a4('dul ba): gal te cung zad cig sbas na/ ji thub par 'khrug pa skyed par 'gyur gyis gang gi tshe 'di kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe dri bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba
75a5('dul ba): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ni zar/ des smras pa/ khyod glang rgan bzhin ldad dam zhes de skad mchi mod khri gas pa/ tshe nga dra pa khyod kyis su yin shes sam/ 'tshal te khyod kyang yang dag par rdzogs
75a6('dul ba): pa'i langs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab rje rab tu byeng ba lags la/ bdag kyang de kha na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags so// des smras pa/ de ni de lta yin te bden na 'on kyang ra
75a7('dul ba): byung bas bya ba 'am byed pa gang yin pa de ngas byas te/ de lta bas nang ni 'ching thams cad las grol ba yin/ khyod ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin na khyod kyis dag
75a8('dul ba): las grub mo smras kyis/ khyod kyis las do chen pa kyang bslabs pa nyid dang / yongs su zad pa nyid dang / yongs su gtugs par 'gyur bar nyes pa la nyes par shegs shig/ des
75b1('dul ba): skyes pa la nye bar bshags so// gang 'dis dge slong dgra bcom pa la glang rgud zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun du spyad ba kun du smad pa'i las de'i rnam par sman pas tshe rabs lnga brkyang ba lang gi skye gan
75b2('dul ba): skyes so// las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis dra ltar sha tshugs pa lang lta bur skyes so// yang dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bri dag
75b3('dul ba): ci zhig bkyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu lung bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
75b4('dul ba): stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so// gang du smon lam btab lags 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de kho na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de 'dis cho
75b5('dul ba): tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur to// gang gi thang du rab tu byung ba de ni bcom ldan 'das 'od krung gis pas mtha' gnas mal la dad pa rnams smin
75b6('dul ba): mchog tu lung bstan to// de na 'dis smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ying dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung gisadu du tshig ci
75b7('dul ba): tshangs par spyod pa spyad yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur gyis/ dge ba'i rtse ba 'dis bdag bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di spyad gis bram la
75b8('dul ba): kye'u bla ma la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dka par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ba
76a1('dul ba): gang yin pa dang/ sung rab la bdag rab tu byung nas nyan mangs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngan sum du byud par 'gyur zhing / dzA ur bdag sa
76a2('dul ba): mkhan po bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mAl la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya'i rgyal po shA
76a3('dul ba): thub pa des pas mtha' gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu ston par gyur cig/ smon lam de'i dbang gi sad lar de bzhin gshegs byas pas mtha'i gnas mA la la
76a4('dul ba): dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig
76a5('dul ba): tAdakar 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ 
76a6('dul ba): dge slong dag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug
76a7('dul ba): na cig/ 'di las byin cig ces 'dam zhing 'dam ning zas za ba dang 'drim pa 'khrugs par gyur nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
76a8('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis padams shing zas bza' bar mi bya ste/ zan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan/ 
76b1('dul ba): ra snang bla rgyal byed kyi tshal mgun med pas spyan gyi kun dka' rab na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams zas rbab na lhung bzed bzang pa las da lhung bzed kyi gzha'i steng du lgang / lgang
76b2('dul ba): bzed kyi gzhi bded pa las lhung bzed du lhung nas dri rnams 'grod de mi za ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
76b3('dul ba): dge slong dag lhung bzed bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa la swa lung bzed kyi nang du lung na byin len byas pa
76b4('dul ba): sa bya/ lung bzed bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i nang du ldang na byin len byas pa zhes bya
76b5('dul ba): 'on kyang byin len gyi sems ni nye bar gzhag par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sprid gyi kun dga' ra bar
76b6('dul ba): zhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ga khar bI'i mgur pa'i drung du song nas des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khar ba'i lhung bzed cig byan nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di
76b7('dul ba): nyid bdaklag pa rdo lags kyis tshad ji tsam zhig bgyid chen por bya'o// 'phags pa khyod la khur ba'i lhung bzed chen po ci 'chi lnga/ bkren pa khyod ci rin med par byed du 'jug snyam
76b8('dul ba): 'am/ rin thang sbyin gyis byos shig/ des bsams pa/ 'di la bdag gi khar ba ci zhig 'gong bya'o snyam nas des de'i khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po zhig byas so// des smras pa/ 
77a1('dul ba): gang 'di'i nang du chud pa gzhan zhig kyang gyis shig/ des gzhan yang byas so// de bzhin du gzhan gang yin pa bdun pa'i bar du byas nas de rnams
77a2('dul ba): nyedaka' thos dge tshul 'khrur btsug ste/ tshon sna lwa ba'i sdud pa las dA ba byed du bcug nas de rnams der bcug ste/ ga rims bu shams nas dge tshul gyi mgo la bsrung te
77a3('dul ba): du 'gron du bos pa der 'gro'o// san nas de dag bkram ste 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci khyod kyis khar ba'i men pa'i thong bkram
77a4('dul ba): des sbas pa/ bkren pa khyed ci shes/ 'dir ni re shig phye dag blang ngo // 'dir ni sdum khur dag go// 'dir ni 'bras chen dag go// gzhan rnams su ni tshed bdag blang ngo // de rnams kyis smras
77a5('dul ba): 'phags pa gal te de lta na ke res 'ga' tshong ma mang po dag 'byung bas gzhan dag dang gzhan dag snga te'ang gzhag dgos so zhes byas pa dang / de cang mi smra nga thu go/ 
77a6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
77a7('dul ba): kyis de ltabs dge nga gis la /  sa na na mo// gas sa
77a8('dul ba): gtogs so// sdom re/ rkang pa bkrab bkag pa dang // shol zangs dag ni gnang ba dang // de bzhin bsil yab nyid dang ni// srang ma rnams la g.yab pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom
77b1('dul ba): 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba ran bzhugs so// dge slong rnams bab bab tu rkang pa 'bru ba der spong bu dag gis gang bar 'dug
77b2('dul ba): ma gram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang ltar 'ongs pa de dag gis mthung nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sbrang bu'i mi mchi bas gang ba'i phyogs 'di cig ga/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa
77b3('dul ba): bdag cag gis 'dir rkang pa bkrus so// de dag 'phya ste/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni gtsang sgra med de bab bab tu rkang pa 'khru'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
77b4('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa bab bab tu bkru bar mi bya'i 'on kyang gnas khang ga steng shar lho'i mtshams su rkang pa bkri ba'i gnas bya'o// bcom
77b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis nang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ru snrel
77b6('dul ba): rab tu 'jam par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub bar bya'o// dge slong nas pa gachags pa nyam chung ba de dag phyogs der 'gro ma nus pa dang / bcom ldan
77b7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gi gyo mo nye bar gzhag par bya'o// dge slong rnams gyo mor 'khru ba na de cha gnas ji ma rung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
77b8('dul ba): shol 'angs nye bar gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis shel zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'i zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngupa dang / 
78a1('dul ba): dang / shel las byas pa'i shol zangs dag nye bar bzhag zhonabram ze dang / khyis bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di/ dernams smras
78a2('dul ba): bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis shol blangs gnang ngo // 'phags pa ci dge slong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gnod pa/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyed kyi mgrin par rdog pa
78a3('dul ba): to// de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' snyam pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUr+ya las bya
78a4('dul ba): shol zangs dag nye bar bzhag par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang 'jim pa las byas pa'i shol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o// rnga mo lta bu te Shar gzhag pa dang / de ldeg nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
78a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i rkang pa lta bur bya zhing de'i dbus su 'bung ka dam pa'i me tog lta bur bya'o// shin tu 'jam por byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
78a6('dul ba): 'a por bya'o// dge slong rnams shol zangs bab bab tu 'jog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ni yang nyi ga yas phung lan gcag/ gang zag da
78a7('dul ba): reganas khang gis lkog tu log cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kau sha ma bAn ska len gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dpyid kyi dus lnga bab nas dge slong rnams tshabs
78a8('dul ba): ste/ de dag lus sa 'o bsod pa sed par gyur cing ni/ nyam chung/ shig shis po// rang nyams par gyur pa kyi ma bdag dang / bram ze rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 
78b1('dul ba): pakyed ni'i slad du lus skya bo bsad pa sed por gyur cing rke/ nyam chung shig shig po// rod nyams par gyur/ de dag gis nga ltar gyur pa bskrad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phag
78b2('dul ba): padag byed pa si la yab mi 'chang ngam/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ma gnang ngo // 'phags padag khyed kyi skyon pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs
78b3('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bga' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis bsil yab bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyil
78b4('dul ba): pashA bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyisA yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa bsrubs pa/ bkra bA dang / nye bar bkra bi'i yu ba can gyi
78b5('dul ba): bsil ya bA dag bcangs pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis shes bya ba nas/ khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de dag 'phya ba'i skabs deng
78b6('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' srab la/ yu ba gser dang dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / she le las byas pa bsrubs pa bkra ba dang / 
78b7('dul ba): bar bkra ba'i smra ba can gyis bsil ya bdag nye bar gzhag par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang bsil phab gnyis po rtsa ru ha las byas pa dang / shing ta la'i 'dab ma bcang bar bya'o// 
78b8('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag dang pa can dag dge slong rnams bsil lab rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhid te/  'acom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta pa
79a1('dul ba): na gnang gis dge 'dun gyi phyir pa tsung bar bya'o// sang rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na smyerba rdzing gi 'gra/ khang pa pa cig pan bzugs so// dge slo
79a2('dul ba): rnams la spyang ma dag za ste/ de dag gi lus skang mas zos pa sngo 'byam bus gang ste/ dgegs yang dang ldang du rmugs pa dang / tham pa khyim pad rnam smras / 
79a3('dul ba): padag snyed ci'i phyir lus 'di ltar 'brum bus gang / de dag kyis ji ltar gyur pa bskrad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa da du yad spang ba I 'chang dum/ 
79a4('dul ba): dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
79a5('dul ba): sol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdzas bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis spang yab bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis spang yab bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa
79a6('dul ba): / drug sde rnams kyis u ba gser dang / dngul dang / baiDUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa dang / rnga ma las byul ba'i skang yab dag nye bar bzhag pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag
79a7('dul ba): sa kyi pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no// spang lab na lnga ste/ bal las byas pa dang / shan las byas pa dang / ram bal las byas pa dang / ras ma dang / lo ma sbams pa'o// sdomani/ 
79a8('dul ba): dang lus dang ni// khar ba dpa 'chang ba dang // sgog spyad ga ni bzhag pa dang gnad pa la ni gnang ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom
79b1('dul ba): kon med za sman dun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis stongs ma bya nas bka' stsal pa dang / dan dge slong gtsug skas la 'jog pa na 'og na shing mkhan
79b2('dul ba): dge 'dug pa des de sadams dang ba mthong nas sbas pa/ 'phags pa khyed skyes pa'i dbang po de dang ldan pas bdag gis po lags par gdod 'tshal lo// de gnod nas cang mi smra bar
79b3('dul ba): 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams gos mdud pa
79b4('dul ba): ma bo rab nyid du skas la 'dzeg pa las gyur gyis de'i phyir dge slong mkhar lan byed pa gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar lan byed du gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la
79b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong stongs ma byed pas dos mdud pa bor nas mkhar lan bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gos mdud pa bor nas mkhan
79b6('dul ba): kyang yis bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams gas mdud pa bor nas mkhar yin byed du num dang pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa ci stobs 'byed dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 
79b7('dul ba): bzangs dag mkhar lani byed do// de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ga
79b8('dul ba): dgags la 'dzeg pa de dag gis mdud pa por bar bya'i bzhan dag gis ni ma yon no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med bris sbyin gyi
80a1('dul ba): kun dka' rab tu bzhugs so// drug sde rnams lus kyis khur gyur ba dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa bdag cag na re shig pha ma dang bu dang rung
80a2('dul ba): ma'i srad du khur rdzogs na khyed su'i slad du lus kyis khur bsnams/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs drag bdag cag la yang sten pa mchod pa dang / dge 'dun pa shos gsol ba dang / 
80a3('dul ba): nad pa rnams kyi rim gro dang / bya ba mang po yod do// de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
80a4('dul ba): delta bas na dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar ma bya'o// khyer ni 'gal chibs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i re la bzhugs so// 
80a5('dul ba): ge slong rnams bya rgod kyi phung po'i re la 'dzeg cing 'bab pa na de dag sred cing rdeg 'chos te snang bar gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom/ 
80a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba dang / de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyi kham yang par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis khar ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' yul pa dang / drus
80a7('dul ba): rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa'i khar ba bsrungs pa/ bkra ba nye bar bkra ba dgra bcangs pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas
80a8('dul ba): 'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na gnyis kyis khar ba bcang bar bya ste/ 
80b1('dul ba): ba dang / na coM nanam dang / rten mdzi ni rtegs pa dang / nad par gtugs sa kyad 'a la / 
80b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan 'i dang nad pas dge 'dun la khAr bi'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing / gang la dge 'dun gyis khar pa'i sdom pa byin pa des kha pa bcang bar bya'o// gsol
80b3('dul ba): pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal ba shams la gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgoms dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang / dge slong rgan po rgas
80b4('dul ba): tenyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas rgan pa'i mthar no ga tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdagra
80b5('dul ba): dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa meng 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las khar ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun thugs brtse ba can btsun pa rnams kyi
80b6('dul ba): thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ nad pa sbyang ma bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i sdom pa bskal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan
80b7('dul ba): gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas na pa las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyim chung
80b8('dul ba): pa 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi pa 'di dge 'dun las khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
81a1('dul ba): mdzad cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzad pa mang 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i sdom pa stsa/ 'ad
81a2('dul ba): gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang
81a3('dul ba): 'dun las khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bkyi phal khar ba'i sdom pa stsol na/ tshe dang
81a4('dul ba): ldan pa gang dag dge slong rgan po nus te nyam chung ba 'am/ nud pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'dri zhes bgyi ba lo khar ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de ldan cang me gA su~Mh+na shig/ glang
81a5('dul ba): dge mi brjod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
81a6('dul ba): lakhar 'a'i sdom pa bstsal lags te 'dri ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang la dge 'dun gyis khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des khor ba bcang bar bya ste/ 'di la
81a7('dul ba): bar mi bya'o// 'dul ba phran tshogs kyi gzhi/ bam po drug pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril bzhugs so// dge slong gnas brtan/ 
81a8('dul ba): gnas brtan rnams dang / chung nad can rnams bya rgod phung po'i re la 'dzeg pa dang / 'bab pa na greng cing rdeg 'chos nas snang bar yang gyur/ bya ma bum dang / ril pa spyi lugs
81b1('dul ba): ga go// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis mamaldan 'as la gsol pa dang / maldan 'as kyis bga' stsal pa/ da lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar bya'o// khas
81b2('dul ba): las kyis dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis tshon sna lnga pa'i srud pa las byas pa'i dra ba bcangs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag
81b3('dul ba): sa kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed do// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las rgya
81b4('dul ba): 'idra ba bcang bar ma bya'i 'on kyang tshon snas cig pa las byas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshon sna cig las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / rgas pas nya
81b5('dul ba): chung bar gtogs pa rnams dang / rlung nade can du gtogs pa rnams kyang dra ba'i chung ba la zhugs nis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po dang rlung nad can gyis kyang
81b6('dul ba): dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing / gang la dge 'dun gyis dra ba'i sdom pa byin pa des dra ba bcang bar bya'o// gsol pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bsham sA la gang
81b7('dul ba): brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dres te 'dug pa dang / dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can gyis rgan pa'i mthar
81b8('dul ba): gcig por 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyang nas chog 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dge 'drin btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung na
82a1('dul ba): can med 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs partsa ba can rnams kyis thugs brtsa ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong rgan
82a2('dul ba): mas te nyam rkang ba'am nad nad can med 'di zhes bgyi ba lengadra ba'i sdom pa sul du gsal/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum rdzi bar du'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gi
82a3('dul ba): gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dra
82a4('dul ba): sgom ldo gsol du/ gal te ge 'dun gyi sul bya ci yod na ni na gyis gan bar mdzo ci ga dang / dag ngan kyi myong rkun pa nas nyam chung ba / rlung na
82a5('dul ba): can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa gsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// lamra ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gas du gsam/ dge slong nan panas te nyam chung ba/ 
82a6('dul ba): 'am rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi bdage 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ de'i TIk+ka mo 'ad gyis dge nga rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/ rlung nang can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
82a7('dul ba): draba'i sdom pa stsos na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes brtsi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa sum par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs
82a8('dul ba): shig/ 9 dag mi bzod pa dedag ni gsungs shog/ dge 'dun gyi mtshad cing gnang nas dag 'dan gyis dge sbyong rgyan po nas te nye srung ba la/ rgyu nga na pa ni zhes
82b1('dul ba): sdom pa sum lags te/ 'a ba na du 'angan to// gang la dag 'an gyis drang sdom pa bAn par kur pa dus dra babs ba bya ste/ 'ang la kya
82b2('dul ba): bya'o// dge slong gzhan dag cig la khar ba yang dgos dra ba yang dgos nas de dag la dge slong rnams kyis khar pa dang/ dra ba'i sdom pa so sor byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
82b3('dul ba): stsal pa/ khar ba dang dra ba'i sdom pa cig car snga ma bzhin sbyin par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgron med zas sbyin gyi kun dag par ba
82b4('dul ba): zhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong zhig 'dug pa dus sgra smra thos nas/ de bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyar pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mig pas phyag 'tshal na
82b5('dul ba): gsu cig tu 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dge slong khyod la chos bstan gyis rna ba gtod la 'dug shig/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab
82b6('dul ba): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan par brtsams te/ de lta ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan pa de lta
82b7('dul ba): ra dge slong de bcom ldan 'das la dris gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ kha logs shig tu lta'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ce
82b8('dul ba): ge gleng khyed la chos bstan gyis rna gtod cig ces bka' stsal na dge slong de lan gnyis lan gsum du yang kha gzhan du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos bya
83a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song dang // spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du chad par mdzod pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dam
83a2('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir ngas ji lta ji ltar chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong de kha gzhan du lta/ des gachos pa/ matsun pa dge slong des
83a3('dul ba): sgrog sgra 'tshal to// kun dga' bo dge slong dag gang gis na bden pa rnams kyis bar chad du 'gyur ba sgrog skya za lta/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags son/ sum ga' bo gal te
83a4('dul ba): ring lkog skya zos par ma gyur na de nyid du 'dis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mi tho ba'i shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas dun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu man
83a5('dul ba): sum du byas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lnga bas na dge slong gi byin cad sgrog sgra dang sku 'dod dang / ke yongs su mongs spyad par ni bya ste/ yong su songs spyod na 'gas tshabs/ 
83a6('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bsams pa/ dge slong 'dis de ring bden pa da shA ma mthong na re shig sang mthong
83a7('dul ba): 'gyur 'am blta'o snyam nas sems pa la zhugs pa dang ma mthong ngo // des rab kyi mtha' ba'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la rnam par bltas nam dus ji tsam na mthong bar 'gyur ba sems/ 
83a8('dul ba): pa la zhugs na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de las lang mdas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dal pa'i mcho gri 'di 'dir bor nas// 'di yis 'di
83b1('dul ba): na 'den pa dag/ rnams kyang shin tu mthong ba na// mo 'gyung ba lo gnas de yod// danam bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'amams mkhyen nas/ cha dang ldan pa shA ra bu/ 
83b2('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyed sangs rgyas kyi yul la lag 'jug par ma byed cig/ 'di ni 'di nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul las 'dras pa'i dus na de bzhin
83b3('dul ba): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyed pa skyes bu 'dul gyi ma pa po sbyor ba bla na med/ 
83b4('dul ba): palha dang me rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gyis kA rlo ba pa ba bya ba'i ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu spyod nas can med/ 
83b5('dul ba): pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong sgo
83b6('dul ba): ba las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis sgog sgra bza' bar mi bya'o// zan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sgog sgra bza' bar mi bya'o zhes
83b7('dul ba): 'dul ba dag dge slong gi sngar ba stan pa'i drung du song ste/ nad mod cig ces byas nas smras pa/ bzhin pa zang sa kyi ba la na di lta bzhig byung de sbyin sdig/ skrod pas smra/ 
83b8('dul ba): / lags pa zhigs gzam cig dang kyang mos par gyur 'das smras pa/ bzhin pa ches bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gan 'o// 'phanas rgyad kyi smon 'di yin te/ gan kyi
84a1('dul ba): gsos par mi nus so// skabs de dge slong rnams la smras so// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tho kang su
84a2('dul ba): gal te sman pa dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni gsos par mi nus so zhes zer na bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nang pos
84a3('dul ba): sman pa'i lung gis sgeg skya bzi'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pas sgog skya thos nas gtsug lag khang la yang longs spyod par byed/ gnas mal dang / snam phyi sa rba
84a4('dul ba): cheb khung du yang 'jug/ dge 'dun gyi nang du yang 'gro/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos ston/ mchod rten sa yang phyag byed/ bram ze dang khyi
84a5('dul ba): dag gi khyim dag tu yang nye bar 'gro// skyed mos tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha khang dang / skye bos gang ba'i phyogs gzhan dag tu yang 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnas
84a6('dul ba): sa dri tshor nas 'phya slod kha zer zhing / dge slong shAkya'i kyi rnams kyi dge slong gi tshul nyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ da ni rab tu byung ba rnams sgrog smra zhes pa/ 
84a7('dul ba): bas de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des dge slong sgom skya za ba'i kun du skyed pa'i tshe sna bca' bar bya
84a8('dul ba): dge slong sgeg smra za bas sgog skya ze bzhin du gtsug lag khang la yongs su longs spyad par mi bya/ gnas mal la ma yin// snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya/ chab khring
84b1('dul ba): // dag 'dun gyi nang du 'gro bar ma bya/ bram ze dang kyis bdag 'angs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan pa ma bya mched rnon la phyogs bya/ bram tha dang khyim bdag rnams
84b2('dul ba): ma du nye bar 'gro bar ma bya/ skyed mes tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha khang dang / skye bos gang ba gzhan dag tu gnas par mi bya'i/ phyogs dben pa gang du gzhan dag gis mthong na ma dad pa
84b3('dul ba): 'gyur bar bza' bar bya'o// gang gi tshe bya ba zin par gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs de nyid du zhag bdun 'dug par bya'o// su 'dod na ni zhag gsum/ ki 'un ni zhag gcig go// de nas khrus byas la
84b4('dul ba): sa dag kyang bkra bar bya zhing bdug bdag gis bdug par bya'o// de nas dri nga ba srid pa dang / gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bya
84b5('dul ba): sa sus tu snang pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa rnams yang dag par blangs te/ mi gnas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// ra chag sA las rno dang po rdzogs so// bsdus pa'im
84b6('dul ba): napasde 'dreg dang gdugs dang ni// be'u ras dang ni rgyan spel ma// len dang tshags dang khrus dang ni// gcin dang sgo 'phar blo ba'o// snga ma ni/ chan pas 'dreg dang 'doms dang ni// de bzhin
84b7('dul ba): na pa nyid dang ni// khri dang rna bstan gla cikA dang ni// khyim na gnas dang glog bA man// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
84b8('dul ba): na dga' rab bzhugs so// gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la rgya byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe nges 'phags pa rnams kyi
85a1('dul ba): dang kha spu bregs shig ces 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// nye dga' bos smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod sgra chen sa 'breg shes/ 
85a2('dul ba): sam/ des smras pa/ 'chags pa de nyid bdag gi bzolags so// bzhin bzangs gal te de lhun tshur shog bregs shig/ des bla chen pas bregs pa dang /  dga' pos smras pa/ 
85a3('dul ba): rjes smras so// 'akren pa khyod ci yang mi shes pa zhig 'di khon bzhin/ mnyam par byos te song shig ces bya'i ba snga ma bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
85a4('dul ba): gis sgo chan pas breg par mi bya'o// dge slong sgra chan pas 'breg na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ske cha pas breg par mi bya'o zhes bka'
85a5('dul ba): stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gi mgo la rma byung nas spu kris reg pa na de dag snang ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
85a6('dul ba): sul pa/ rma'i thar kor gyi sgra chan pas breg par bya zhing / lhag ma rnams spyi gris breg par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
85a7('dul ba): zas sprin kye kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ste zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// bzhin bzangs mdoms/ 
85b1('dul ba): phyogs kyi spu 'brags shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lcags so// bzhin bzangs gal te de ltan tshar shog breg shig/ 'phags pa ji 'dra bar brag/ bzhin// 
85b2('dul ba): da'adas mdzes par brigs shig/ des breg pa brtsams pa dang / nye dga' smras pa/ bzhin 'dus 'di ltar byos shig/ des bsnyen byas pa dang / yang smras pa/ gzhan 'di lta thu yang bya
85b3('dul ba): shig ces des de ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas/ dge slong shAkya'i sras rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni nyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul ni nyams te/ de ni gsang ba'i phyogs kyi spu yang
85b4('dul ba): 'breg par byed do zhes smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong drug gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye
85b5('dul ba): bas na dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o// dge slong mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu 'breg par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi
85b6('dul ba): mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gi sa mdoms kyi phyogs su ma byung ba dang / dge slong dag gyod nas sgyu 'breg par mi byed do// danas
85b7('dul ba): gzhan dgal yang srin du byung ste/ de dag da'i gnod pa sa dge ba'i phyogs kyi byang mi nus pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gris bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
85b8('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag la byastan nas phra'am srin bu phyir ni mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu brel par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas
86a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// rna nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyar
86a2('dul ba): kyis 'breg mkhan gyi mi gtang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// bzhin bzangs khyod byin sru 'breg shes sam/ 'phags pa de nyid bdag gis bzo lags so// bzhin
86a3('dul ba): breg par bgyi/ bzhin bzangs mdzes par bregs shig/ de sa breg par brtsams pa dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ 
86a4('dul ba): bzhin bzangs 'di ltar byos shig/ des de bzhin byas pa dang yang smras pa/ gzhan 'di ltar yang byos shig/ des de ji tsam nam spos kyi bar du ma btang bas/ khyim bdag mgon med
86a5('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis de la zhes bya ba nas/ dris pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / de smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la

86a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis byin spu breg par mi bya'o zhes ba2/ 
86a8('dul ba): dang / dge slong rnams kyi brlal rma bung zhing dge slong gzhan dag la srin bu bung nas/ de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs bye bar mi rus par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong/ 
86b1('dul ba): dag ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mabyung ba'i phyir 'am/ srin byung ba'i phyir na byin snga phrog par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyud pa
86b2('dul ba): sang brgya pa bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na N+Dal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug snga rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed cing / de dag
86b3('dul ba): la nas ku re byed/ rtse bar byed/ ca co smra bar byed/ rgod pa dang 'phar g.yeng dang / lus la rdeg par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la/ sol pa dang / bcom ldan
86b4('dul ba): 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed pa las gyur pas de'i phyir dge slong gzhan dang lhan cig khri gcig la nyal du mi gzhu
86b5('dul ba): snyam du dkrongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis deng phyin cad dge slong gis khri gcag la nyal po mi pa'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du gyur ro// bcom
86b6('dul ba): ni'adas kyis dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ste/ ljongs rgyu ba na ri brag shig tu phyin nas de dag
86b7('dul ba): sa der khri brnyas pa dang / de dag gis khre dag byin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di dag nyungs kyis gzhan yang snoms te sbron cig/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag ca
86b8('dul ba): kri re re la skye bo mang po dag nyal bar bgyid no// khyed gzhin yang g.yor ma/ ri ri la gnyis sam gsum gzims par mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
87a1('dul ba): gan da nya rgal ba / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags padag khrag na nam byams so// da skad smos pas

87a4('dul ba): bya'o// khri la nge la bar rtswa stan dang gzhan dag la yang de dang 'dra'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra bar

87a6('dul ba): rnams kyis gos brnyas pa dag bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba yin no snyam ste/ snying rje nye bar bzhag ste gos dag byin pa dang / gang gis gang thob pa
87a7('dul ba): des de gyon te nyal nas dge slong gzhan dag grang bas sbrebs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
87a8('dul ba): pa/ gang gis gang thob pa de dag nyid kyis bgo bar mi bya'i thams cad kyis bgo bar bya ste/ gcig rnyed par gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyi steng du rgan rims bzhin ji tsam
87b1('dul ba): pa dgang par bya'o// ji tsam na yang ra brags gzhan zhig tu dang ba dang / da / gnad nas de dag ga stang du g.yogs pan tad kas de rtson te chag tu song ba da
87b2('dul ba): rnams grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' ba bdag cag ni grang bas sdug bsngal na khyod 'ba' shag gyon nas 'chag gam/ des smras pa// kho mas bka gras
87b3('dul ba): khyed kyang ci'i phyi mchag/ de rnams grang ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mtshan 'das par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

87b5('dul ba): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// grang bas dus la bab pas dge slong rnams grang ba'i gnod pas glos phab ste 'dug go// ji tsam na khyim
87b6('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / des de dag mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags ba tso'i slad du gcig tu brtson pa'i gsung rab la klos phyab ste bzhugs shing dge
87b7('dul ba): logs dag mi mdzad/ de dag gis smras pa// khyim bdag byed pa dang ldan pa dag ni chos dran par 'gyur gyi// bo cig shin du grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur to// des khyim du song ras
87b8('dul ba): be'u ras lnga brgya bkur ba dang / dge slong rnams kyi khyim pa'i gos de dag bgos te phyi rol tu dong ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas co dri zhing smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci byed
88a1('dul ba): khabs sa ma// de dag gis smras pa/ khwabacugags grang bar gyung nas pags rgyas tshe dang ldan pa dag na ma thar tsak+sha/  rnams slo bar byed pa'i skabs dadage slong dag

88a3('dul ba): ras bgo bar bya'o// dge 'dun gyi yang de bzhin du gyon par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ni 'og tu gos bcug nas steng nas g.yogs te bgo bar bya'i

88a6('dul ba): ge 'dug pa de gos byas shing byas shing 'tshong bar byed do// dus gzhan zhig na des gos mang ba rnyed par gyur nas/ des bsams pa thabs ji lta bu zhig byas na des bsod nams
88a7('dul ba): da'athob cing rnyed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de dad pa can zhig pas de'i blo skyes te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs la gos kyi gdan bsha
88a8('dul ba): gdags tshod gsol lo// de ltar byas na kos kyang yongs su spyad par 'gyur la/ gos yongs su longs spyad pa dang zhal zas yongs su yongs spyad pas bsod nams chen po yang/ 
88b1('dul ba): par 'gyur nga snyam du gnas/ des sangs dus la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas nal zas gcing na bsod pa bshams te gdan dan// 
88b2('dul ba): gi steng du gos bting ngo // de nas gang du bshams zin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren gyis spyan drangs na dge slong gi dge 'dun ni gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das ni gtsug lag khang na

88b6('dul ba): na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms drangs so// dge slong rnams la ma kar char pabab nas de dag gi gos char bas ga shed bzhin du 'khod pas gang gi gos ci 'dra byas la 'od 'di'i de kho
88b7('dul ba): bubu'i swa spre byung bar gyur pa bram ze des mthong ba dang 'khrugs nas smras pa/ Na bdag gi zong 'di lta bu dag zong du mi rung bar bkyis kyis gos 'di dag khyed thal byung snoms shig ces
88b8('dul ba): slong de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das lagasal pa dang / bcom ldan 'as kyis bka stsal pa/ dge slong dag bral ze des ma dang pa skyes nam byin pas phreng bar mi bya'o// de 'adz+ra
89a1('dul ba): pa de dang bral nas yang dus dad pa'i sems kyis phul 'a'i skangs de dade slong dag gi bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
89a2('dul ba): pa/ dge slong dag nga ni bram ze des dad pa'i sems kyis phul bas blang bar bya ste/ blangs nas kyang rung ba byas la bgo bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis blangs pa dang / bram ze des sgyu

89b2('dul ba): paganyis bcang bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba ring po ring por byas nas gdugs kyi rtsa ba bsgreng ste grong khyer gyi nang du song ba dang / bram ze dang / 
89b3('dul ba): nyim bdag gis mthong nas 'di lta bu nor can nam/ tshong dpon nam/ ded dpon nam/ su zhig 'ong zhes langs nas rtog par byed do// kha cig sar dong ba dang / gang gi tshe mthong bar gyur pa de'i

89b5('dul ba): tshad tsam gyi rtsa ba gdags par bya zhing grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal
89b6('dul ba): pa dang / ri tsam na dge slong mang po dag don 'dun dang lhan cig stongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / re shes na grong du les byung bar gyur nas de dgags bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klong gi dang
89b7('dul ba): du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bkar stsal pas grong dor bar bya'o snyam nas de dag gis grong spangs pa dang / don 'thun rnams dang bral bas chom pos bcom pa'i skabs
89b8('dul ba): dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te grong gi dbus su lam byung bar gyur na gdugs glor bskal nas 'dod pa
90a1('dul ba): bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bsod snyoms pa rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / char ba bab nas mang rgyas gas gshang ba tshu
90a2('dul ba): dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsod snyoms pas gdugs kyi rtsa ba rung bar byas nas 'jug par bya ste/ zhugs nas
90a3('dul ba): la te chang ban na gdugs khyim dang por bzhag la 'jug par bya zhing de nas phyir blangs te 'gro bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed tsha
90a4('dul ba): bkon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// lho phyogs kyi yul nas kun du rgyu 'jig rten chang ban pa 'char ba zhes bya ba zhig longs rgyu mi mnyan yod du 'ongs so// de sa
90a5('dul ba): bgonas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di r+ya ga la ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/ kye dge sbyong kho bos bla ma dag las blangs pa'i yi ge cung zad yod da/ de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gtam
90a6('dul ba): bar 'dod do// des de la smras pa/ bram ze kho bo sla ba don du gnyer ba ma yin gyis song shig/ de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang bzang po dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags par// 
90a7('dul ba): gang po dang / dri med dang / ba ling nga dag dang / lag bzangs ga la ba der song ba dang / de rnams kyis kyang de khron skad smras so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la rnyer song ste
90a8('dul ba): nas smras pa/ kye dge slong kho bos bla ma las yi ge rlung zad blangs pa dag yod de/ de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gta mi bya bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 
90b1('dul ba): ni kun du// 'di la dge 'du rtsa ba cung zad yod dma'an te med snyam na smad par mthong ngo // yul rag las brtags na bdag nyid la'o//  smrabs 'dul ba gzhan cung zad yod dam snyanan 'ad
90b2('dul ba): mthong ngo // ji tsam na tshogs pa brtags na zhag bdun tshun chad kyis tshogs par shes nas smras pa/ legs te de bzhin byan rig pa'i gnas gang du bya/ che ge mo zhig tu'o// sla ba'i
90b3('dul ba): rnal che ba bzhag ste phyogs snga ma dang phyi ma rnam par bzhag nas/ sus phyogs snga ma/ sus gzugs shes glengs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sbas pa/ kun du chu glo bur du 'das
90b4('dul ba): pa yin pas 'di nyid kyis phyogs sngam tshugs shig/ kun du rgyus phyogs snga ma smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bzlas nas khyod kyi 'di ni mo rigs so// 'od ni ma 'dra'o// 
90b5('dul ba): 'dri ni mi 'thad do zhes skyon btags so// des yang smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jug tu ma phyin par bzhag go// lho phyogs kyi yul nas sun du rga 'jig rten rgyang pan pa 'char/ 
90b6('dul ba): pa zhes bya ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs te/ de dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bu dang lhan cig brtsad nas/ deng du zhag 'dun lon no zhes kun du sgra grags pa dang / srog chags brgya brag mang po
90b7('dul ba): dag 'a cig ni pha mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bdag gis bskul nas 'dus pa dang / che dang ldan pa dA ri bus bsams pa/ bdag gi skabs 'dul ba 'dus sam sA mun
90b8('dul ba): 'dris par ming / na mi cingang ldan pa shA 'i 'as ma lus par smras pa dang / kun du na par gad do// den mi mngon par da bar byung tesmras pa/ btsun pa shA se / 
91a1('dul ba): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bstan par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gdangos pa 'thob na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das / 
91a2('dul ba): bar spyod pa spyad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rab tu phyung bstan par rdzogs par byas te/ gdams ngag byin no// des brtsal ba dang 'bad pa dang bsgrim pa byas pas 'khor
91a3('dul ba): ma la la groso ba migs pa 'di nyid stegs bya ba nas gas bya// khor bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i ba snum yin no// de na pa 'kho da 'phags pa shA ra~M
91a4('dul ba): bus 'di lta bu'i sme ba chen po pham par byas so// zhes shin tu ya mtshan skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de dag gis bsams pa dang / bkra la nyal dang / khakra
91a5('dul ba): dang / rang bzhin rtogs nas de dag dang 'thun par chos bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gis de thos nas skrag pa'i khyad par chen po thob pa 'di lta ste/ kha cig/ 
91a6('dul ba): gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas// kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu kha cig gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun la
91a7('dul ba): gzhol zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das pa gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag thams
91a8('dul ba): cad du dge slong shA ri'i bu ma/ shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar mi 'gyur bas de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang phan pa la sogs pa phyi rol 'ji bstan pato// 
91b1('dul ba): bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong byis pa 'am/ 
91b2('dul ba): rmongs pa 'am/ me gsal bdag gis kyang thams cad kyis khyad par med par bslabs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod nus pa gang yin pa
91b3('dul ba): de dag gis 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'i'o/ byis pa dang / rmongs pa dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas bdag gis ma yin no// de rnams
91b4('dul ba): la brtson pa nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum du byas la/ dus gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab klag par bya zhing gsum pa la ni phyi rol pa'i
91b5('dul ba): bstan bcos dag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum du bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lo dang zla ba'i dus dag tu slob par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
91b6('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag tshe ni skad cig ma yin bsrungs lo dang zla ba'i dus la dgongs te ma gsungs kyi/ 'on kyang nyin gcig la cha gsum du bya'o// dge slong rnams gsal ba'i dus su ni
91b7('dul ba): phyi rol ba'i bstan bcos 'dren la/ gzhan dag tu ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab 'don nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsal ba'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab gdon par
91b8('dul ba): bya ste/ phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos ni ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan
92a1('dul ba): pashA ribus bram ze'i khye'u lha spyan dang / ba lang 'byor gnyis rab tu mang nas/ de dag pad ldan pa shA thus med ste 'dod du bcug go// dza tsam dus gzhanan
92a2('dul ba): spangs rgyu zhing dong nas blugs shig tu phyin pa dang / der de dag pa dad pa dang bkur ste man po byung nas dri gnas dang 'dzad do// de gnyis sngon goms pa'i shugs kyis sangs
92a3('dul ba): kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyor dang / tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas kha ton du 'don to// de dag las gcig ni shi'o// cig shos kyis gzung brjed par gyur nas/ de la kha ton las byung
92a4('dul ba): 'i rnyed pa med nas de deng de dag tu mkhyam 'khyam nas phyir mnyan yod du 'ongs so// de nas ral bsos te tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau N+Di n+ya ga la ba dar song ste phyag byas nas smras pa/ 
92a5('dul ba): gnas brtan g.yar ton dpog du gsol/ des smras pa/ bu legs so de bzhin kha ton bslab po zhes des de dang lhan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang / kha ton thung ngur 'don nas
92a6('dul ba): sa pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyis ring por lnga btan pas gdon nongs so// des smras pa/ bu kho bos de ltar bslabs so// des do'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang ldan// 
92a7('dul ba): thul dang / bzang po dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba ldang bdag dang / lag bzangs gal ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa la phyag
92a8('dul ba): 'a'atshal te/ smras pa/ gnas brtan g.yar ton dpog tu gsol/ des smras pa/ khu legs so de bzhin kha ton bslab par bya'o// zhes des de dang lhan cig kha ton gdon po
92b1('dul ba): mas pa dang / de nas kha ton byung ngarang tan nas smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyis gdon nongs so// des smras pa/ bu khrobs da ltar ba mas so// dus der rkang pa la phyag byas nas
92b2('dul ba): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal ba der song gi sbyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bul 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan pos g.yar ton dpag tu
92b3('dul ba): gsol/ des smras pa/ 'u legs so// de bzhin du kha ton du bslab po// des de dang spyan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam nam teni ring por bton nas/ me dang ldan pa shA ra
92b4('dul ba): ring por bton pa dang / des smras pa/ mkhan po dge slong de dag kun gyis ni gdon nongs kyi/ khyod nyag gcig gis ma nyams par bton to// des smras pa/ mi thun po khyod nyid kyis gdon nyas kyi/ 
92b5('dul ba): dge slong dag gis ni ma nyams par bton to zhes des de smyos nas cad mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
92b6('dul ba): pa/ nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba ni dge slong rnams sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bsdeb sbyor dang / tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas 'don pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sangs rgya
92b7('dul ba): kye gsung rab bsdeb skar dang / tshig dang rim par sbyar nas gdon par mi bya'o// dge slong gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bsdeb sbyar dang / tshig dang rim par sbyar nas 'don na 'gal tshabs
92b8('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro// yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang / skad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig yin na ltung ba med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
93a1('dul ba): tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dka'ar ba na bzhugs so// drug sngon ma sogs pa'i gnas skabs na yang da dag byang ba dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ 
93a2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed mgo skyes kyang dadung rgod pag mi gtong ngam/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod nas mtha' gcig tu dong ste smras pa/ dga' bos nye dga' lhung bzed nag pa can dkos
93a3('dul ba): zag pa 'di dag la mi dga' zhig bya'o zhes de dag de ltar glags tshol ba la brtson par 'khod pa na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag dgon pa'i gnas su dong ste bsam gtan
93a4('dul ba): dang klag par bya ba dag brtsams so// de nas drug sde rnams kyis gnas gsum na la nags mes btang ste ras gcig tu 'dus nas bsdad pa dang / dge slong rnams nags mes chag
93a5('dul ba): pa'i gnod pa byung bas rings pa rings par 'bros par brtsams so// drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan dag ci'i slad du rings rings ltar bzhud/ tshe dang ldan pa dag nags
93a6('dul ba): kyi me ma mthong ngam/ gnas brtan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i gnas skabs su tshul khrims gsungs sam ci lagaso zhes cung zad nad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 
93a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis khob cag la bsdams bzhin du ma gces grang / bkren pa dag byed de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o zhes zer ba'i spobs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
93a8('dul ba): 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis nags mel btang bar mi bya'o// gtong na nyes pa sdom par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
93b1('dul ba): 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyitshal man/ ma da ts+tshaHkun dga' dban bzhugs so//  na 'din dag gleng rgan pa na ga dang / gas nga ba dang / rkan
93b2('dul ba): bo la ni sad mang shing mo byud mang la/ gas rab ni ma khrugs shing chos gos gas ma lngas lhag pa med pa zhigapas/ zhan pos sul ba/ me dang ldan pa kho shi kyis mas
93b3('dul ba): gtur bu khyer te shog shig/ gas bu des smras pa/ gnas brtan bka' 'bab par mi 'gyur na re shig cung zad ci gra gsol ba mchis so// nA dang ldan pa 'di la su shig gshe slom shi
93b4('dul ba): nas brtan sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun lam gzigs samra ni/ rmongs pa'i ye byad 'de ci zhig bkyin bzhin bzangs gal te mi bkur ba ni re sheg drang na 'di dri bar bya
93b5('dul ba): khyod kho bo'i mkhan po'am/ slob dpon yin nam/ cigang gi phyir rjes su ston par byed// de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgan pas bsams pa/ bkren pa 'di ma dgra' ba dpyor
93b6('dul ba): sbrus mo//  man de gnyis gtsugal ga khang du rung ba dang / den mu gcig sbyong mi gnas par 'dug pa'i mi bya ba'i khrims su bya ba yod de/ de gnyim lazhanas mal tshigs te/ 
93b7('dul ba): byed bsreganas ma la dgra snyoms shig ces m+b+ha'i pa dang / nani gis ni blangs so// gas bu sa ske pa/ tshe dang ldan gas sa yonas ma bcas kyis/ ji gnas gas pa la na da
93b8('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi shin du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ gnas brtan padag gis gan mad du gsol/ des smral pa/ bzhin pa 'das kyang su dang rgyan ci
94a1('dul ba): 'ongs/ gnas brtan dge slong cheg ma zhig dang ngo // bzhin bzang sa de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis bdag 'a khor dang po'o zhes zer du 'ong gis song la de nyid la
94a2('dul ba): gnas gsol cig/ de gzhan dag gis gan du snang ba dang / thams cad kyis de bzhin spangs nas nam sros te rgan po de nyid kyi gan du song nas sgrol brngubs te smras pa// gnas
94a3('dul ba): brtan phyag 'tshal lo// khyod suzhis bdag ming ng+ge zhes pa kyi bde lags so// khyod nad med par gyur cig/ gnas brtan gtsug la ga khang 'din rab cig kyang pi gnas par mchis pa
94a4('dul ba): che sman bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol// bzhin bzangs dge 'dun gyis de lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba mdzad pa legs te/ gal tes mdzad na
94a5('dul ba): pos 'char gzhug pa zhig de'i tshe ni kho bo snod mang zhing yo byad mang ba yin la/ da ni gnas brtan yin nam// khyad ma gus pa byas kyang gnas ster ba gang yin pa de la gnas chos
94a6('dul ba): shig/ de spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi sgri bar 'dug ste/ dri'i gnas par chud du gyur pa'i skal la de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
94a7('dul ba): rjes bka' stsal pa/ gnas med par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya/ dge slong gis sa dge bzhin gtum por mi bya/ dge 'dun gyis kyang dge slong rnams la gnod par 'thar ba'i
94a8('dul ba): khrims bca' bar mi bya ste/ dge slong gi nas mi bcas par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro'am/ sade bzhin gtum por byed dam/ dge 'dun gyis khrims su bya ba de lta bu bcas na thams
94b1('dul ba): cad 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nabs 'brang ba tshe dang ldan pa kra slong dang rwaya ma ga d+har ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te grang khyer pa kar can du gshegs
94b2('dul ba): dam/ sa kAr nAn+dan gnod spyan bku la'i gnas na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mnam sros te/ mun gnag cing kha ci cung zad cung zad char 'bab cing glag 'byung ba
94b3('dul ba): bla gab med pa'i 'chagason 'chag pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhabs 'bring ba dge slong rnams ni ji srid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nang du
94b4('dul ba): yang dag 'jog la mi bzhugs pa de srid du nang du yang dgra 'jog la mi 'jug go// brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i shes pa dang mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/ sangs rgya
94b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das da grong khyengs kar can na sa kar can gyi ri la gnod sbyin bku la'i gnas na bzhugs shing / de mtshan mo nam thos te mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad cung zad char 'bab
94b6('dul ba): klog 'byung ra// blag pa med pa'i 'chags na 'chag ste/ ma la bdag darang nye bar 'gror snyam du rig nas bid d+ha las byas pa'i dri gtsA khang mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das pa
94b7('dul ba): la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa mdzad pa'i zhabs 'bring na 'chag cing 'dug go// de'i tshe yul ma ga d+ha ba'i mi rnams khye'u dang bu mo du ba gang yin pa de dag la
94b8('dul ba): dmas gan pyad 'aku la'i ming gis bsdogs par byed do// de das tshe dang ldan pa klu sbyang gi la 'di snyam du 'a'ams te/ kyem bcom ldan 'das ha cang yun ring du ba gang med pa'i 'chag
95a1('dul ba): san 'dag sad mal bdag gis de la gnod ston pa salas bsdigs so snyam du riganas lang sgrog+sa skye bgos nas lachagasar slad du/ rlog ste// / 
95a2('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to ba ku la bkul dge slong de ni gnod sbyin bkul yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kra skyong la 'ang skad ces bka'
95a3('dul ba): stsal to// mi thun po khyad kyang de bzhin gshegs bral gnod sbyin ba ku las bsngags par sems pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
95a4('dul ba): mas ni bskongs pa dang bag tsha ba dang bral ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsgyings pa 'am/ zhum pa 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ma dang
95a5('dul ba): par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa chos 'dul ba 'di la 'ang 'dra ba'i gang zag kyang mchis sam/ kau shi ka khyod sdod cig/ gau ta ma'i rigs ni rgya
95a6('dul ba): ba yin pas 'di yang byis rnam par dag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ngo ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs glang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dge la bslag ste gyon pa las gyur
95a7('dul ba): par mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dgra slong dag mi zlar paklu sbyong gisal ba bzlog ste bgos nas de bzhin gshegs pang bkul ba ku lA/ dge sbyong nga ni ga
95a8('dul ba): sbyin bku la yin no// zhis zer te/ de lta bas ni dge slong gis la ba bzlog ste bgo bar mi bya'o// gyon na 'gal tshangs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gisal ba
95b1('dul ba): bsregs bkrod/ na ga la tshabs can du gyur // rgyas dka' stsal pa dang / dag/ slang sayang ga gnas na 'a khad pade dgags dngal pa'i 'go bdag rkad pa dang / de dag la
95b2('dul ba): shigazugs te/ dge slong rnams shig gis zos pas bde ba mi 'thob pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
95b3('dul ba): la bra ba slog ste gyon pas 'dug par bya/ nyal bar bya'i bcag par ni mi bya'o// sdom ni/ be'u ras dang ni la ba dang // de bzhin la ba'i mchog dang ni// sprog mig sgrog rten mdud pa dang // skar
95b4('dul ba): dag ni gsum yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
95b5('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal gdage slong dag gal te dge 'dun la be'u ras grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
95b6('dul ba): chel mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing snga ma bzhin te/ dge 'dun la la ba grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang ginang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
95b7('dul ba): yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing snga ma bzhin te/ dge 'dun la lab mchog grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo // 
95b8('dul ba): sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyan yadan rgyal bu rgyal byed tshatshal mgon pa dpos sbyin gyi srin dga' ra ban bzhugs so// mnyan mad na dge slong bayid snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de sadz+ra
96a1('dul ba): sham thabs dang chos gos bags/ lhung brjod thogs te mnyan 'a du sod snyoms na phyir zhugs so// dpras rnams kyi spyod ci ba na chos gos nir nas// 
96a2('dul ba): ltar bsnang bar lhung bzengs la bzhag nas/ de cezhes byas pa dang / de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthang dam 'phya shing dge slong shAkya'i bu'i rnams ni gtsang sbra med de/ 
96a3('dul ba): nga bzed 'babab tu 'jog go/ zhes pa'i sbubs de de spyong rnams kyis bcom sdud 'das la gsal po dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bzha' stsal dge/ 
96a4('dul ba): dang gis lhung bzed bab pa'ar tu bzhag par mi bya'o// dge slong lhung bzed paba'ab tu 'jog ni bas na du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang chos gros bsrung ba'i phyir sa
96a5('dul ba): gos kyi sgrog mig gdags ya bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis btags pa dang / des chos gos ral nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kar rgyal pa// srog zungs kyis klon la thogs shig/ 
96a6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyi sgrog zungs kyis glan nas btags pa dang / de sgrog mdud med pas ma chags te nyes dmigs du gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdud pa
96a7('dul ba): 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na 'azhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig
96a8('dul ba): 'dag pa de snga dr-i sham thabs deng chos gol bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod skabs kyi phyir tshugs la// de 'asod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na smad g.yogs snyil ba dang / 
96b1('dul ba): sbyar ba mA bar snang bzed pa la bzhag ste/ dachags rtsas so// bra ma rba dang / bya ba bdag dmas cad ma bsdam bzhanan/ kham ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal gams
96b2('dul ba): srung ba'i phyir/ dga' rnam pa gsum po// shang bu dang / shur 'i phre dang / sdig pa bcang bar bya'o// 'dul ba phra chags / bam pa dun pa/  / na pasrer nga
96b3('dul ba): bzhugs pas// rgyan spel ma dang chad bral tsa// zlag mda'i ni gser srad can// khra bo thams cad 'gag pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skye'i gnasan na gro d+ha'i kun dag
96b4('dul ba): rAr ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe shAkya ming chen gyi khyim gyi zhal ta pa dus las 'das pa dang / ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i cha shas dag shes ming rkyen ga la ba der song ste smras pa/ de khyod
96b5('dul ba): kyi khab kyi zhal ta ba yum za/ zhal ta ba gzhan zhig bskor gsol/ de sade'i drung na bram ze'i gye'u zhig 'dug pa de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re shi' khyod song+ga shig/ ji tsam nazhal tab
96b6('dul ba): kazhan zhag btang ngo // de seng nas des chos bzhin du rigs par snad pas dpyan ba dang / bla smras rab tu mang nga' phul pa dang / shAkya ming chen gyis smras pa/ pra shwa re'i sna'u dpya nang ma dang bu
96b7('dul ba): skyes 'di ltar mang ba khyod kyis skyo ngo'i tshogs la gnod par ma byis grung / dpe smras pa/ rje panar ma dang bla skyes 'dir rnas pa'i mchis pa lags te/ bdag gis spyi ba'i tshogs la
96b8('dul ba): gnod pa 'khyil pam la nas so// de sa'i brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u 'dis khyer 'ga' la gnod pa mi byed grang / rdzi dpyanar ma dang tha
97a1('dul ba): skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/ 'dis 'gra' la yang gnod pa ma bgyis so zhes smras pa dang / des der brags kyi zhal ta bang bcug go// 'a
97a2('dul ba): rje 'byor ba 'du nga nga ba dang mi mthun pa yin pa sa de la bras thegasan nig gis bum byin pa dang / des de nyi mi dang / rgyas grangs dang / yud na ma dang sbyar nas dge sar blangs
97a3('dul ba): de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgung spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu khye'u zhig btsas te/ de btsas
97a4('dul ba): bcas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming dang btags so// yang de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i ba
97a5('dul ba): yang rgya cher byas nas mi dra zla ba zhes bya bar btags so// de bskyed bsrings te chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing sbed lom dang 'gro 'dug 'og zebs re brags na gnas hrI
97a6('dul ba): tshogs thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i khye'u den par gyur nas rtsa ba dang / sdang bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyi
97a7('dul ba): ma gro byas kyang nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas/ ri brags pa des dbya nar mA dang / bla skyes phul ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad spyad cing sbyin po gzhan dag blangs nas/ 'on kyang sos
97a8('dul ba): paparam gyur nas de de nyid du dus las 'das so// re brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag shAkya ming chen ga la 'der 'ongs te smras pa/ rje zhal ta ba da ni gum lags so// des
97b1('dul ba): smras pa/ shes ldan dag ded dpa nam sa dang bla mas su yul ba yod dpa/ rje nye par mang du phul med das tha tshal pa'i yo byad tu spyan na kyangams pa ma byung nam smad pa ga
97b2('dul ba): myang bgyis so// deng la den lhag ma cung zad ci yod pa des bu lon labs shig/ rje de na chung zad chung ma mchis te/ lus par btab na de'i mchis brang dang / bu bo dang du ma mchis te/ 
97b3('dul ba): mode mkhas shing spyod lam dang 'gre 'dug 'o/ ze ba laklas pas brags na gnas 'i'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid du mche bar gyur to// ming chen gyis sbas pa/ shes ldan dag
97b4('dul ba): tungang dang bu pho dag ci dgar zong la bu mo de 'dir khug shig/ de rnams kyis de'i chung ma dang bu pho de dag ci dgar btang nas pra mode ming chen gyi gan du khrid do// shAkya ming chen gyi chung ma
97b5('dul ba): mo gcig kha zas g.yo ba dang / me tog thu ba'i las rnam gnyis byed pa des smras pa/ jo bo de ni bdag shin tu rgas pas sug las rnam gnyis bgyid rngo mi thog na/ zla ba 'di bdag gi
97b6('dul ba): phyogs su bskor gsol/ des de ngan grags su bsgos so// de la des smras pa/ zla bakhyod ni kun dkar ra bar mongal me tog kyang shig/ ngas ni khams ga'o// de na dga'i ra bang
97b7('dul ba): nasu me to/ btus te de nas phreng ba legs par 'a ma nas mang chen gyi gan du sang ba dang / de mthong nas yongasas dga' stsa smras pa/ legs so shog shig ces smras nas chung
97b8('dul ba): rgan po de la 'di skad ces smras so//  byed sngon ni po tig nyung la de ring mang bar gyur/ des smras pa/ sngon ni khyod kyi gnyen dag mchis nas 'dag la spong ba na bdag gis de dag la

98a8('dul ba): ngapo khyod kyis gal te yongs su btang na lhung bzed 'dir byin cig ces bkar stsal ba dang / des shin tu dad pas bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms de phul nas zhabs gnyis
98b1('dul ba): pa phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bran po dang dbul por mi 'gyur bar sog shig/ ji tsam na de'i pha'i grogs po bram ze mtshan mkhan zhig yod pa des de mthong nas
98b2('dul ba): bral ba/ bu mo khyod ga las 'ongs/ ri brag sa de kho na nas so sul gnas shing 'dus des smras pa/ yang na skal brgyang du gnas pa na ste/ bdag med chen gyi bran tho bgyis so// khyod kyi pa de gar song/

98b6('dul ba): skyes kyang kyang // rgyal po btsun par bzhes par 'gyur// khyed mi dga' ma byed par song shig dang / khyod bran mor mi 'gyur gyi khyod rgyal po'i btsun mer 'gyur ro// de gnas denas skyed mo sa tshal du stong

98b8('dul ba): nas/ des bu mod la dris pa/ bu mo 'di su'i kun dga' rab yin des smras pa/ lha shAH ming chen gyi legs so// de rta las pa'as te spel pa/ bu mo rkang pa 'khrul chu long shig/ de shin tu
99a1('dul ba): chung nga 'thob pa su rdza pa 'ang / dang rkang pa 'dun nas nag brdzu smra gzum gang bkrus chu yang nag/
